website_summaries.verdict: A vibrant dog life jacket that is a proven choice for dogs big and small.
pros: Features an adjustable belt and quick-release buckles that make it easy to put the life jacket on or take it off
Includes a front float for added safety
Offers reflective stripes and bright colors to guarantee maximum visibility
cons: Tends to provide a tight fit
Hook connection for leash may break over time

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie vest but order from the pictured size chart, not the typed one!
customer_reviews.text: Third time is the charm! After 3 tries, I finally found a life vest that fits correctly. When sizing this item, go by the measurements in the pictures, NOT the measurements typed in the description. For reference, my 5lb Pomeranian with a neck measurement of 9", a chest measurement of 13", and a back measurement of 9" fits perfectly in an XS. I like that even the smaller size on these have the double chest/belly strap to provide extra support in case a quick pickup is needed and the reflective strips work very well. My dog also doesn't seem to mind wearing this at all, she was bouncing around happily from the moment I put it on her.
customer_reviews.author: MeadowlarkMT

customer_reviews.title: Too cute! And of course functional!
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect on my 11 pound yorkie, got the xs. Can't wait to take my baby kayaking!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an XL and it fits perfectly for my 70 lb pit bull. It provides bouency to help her stay afloat. She wears it almost all day while swimming in our pool. She alwayweara it while out on our boat and swimming in the Gulf of Mexico. I highly recommend you properly measure the chest of your dog in order to get the proper fit. The reviews I've read that comment on wrong sizing the reviewer only mentions the weight of their dog. The chart clearly mentions measureing the chest. For dogs with a broad chest, such as pit bulls, this is more important then their weight.
customer_reviews.author: jeid

customer_reviews.title: Good lifebest for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog have long body so I was concern about the size but the size was accurate. He had neck size around 9-10 and froth around 14 and I ordered him XS. It was short on his body but it fit him comfortably and he floated well. The handle at the back also helps. My dog fell off my flat in the rapid and my friend was able to rescue him using the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She didn't mind having it on at all and very much enjoyed swimming in it
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size small for my 13lb pug. She quite long and trim. She didn't mind having it on at all and very much enjoyed swimming in it. The handle came in handy when she jumped out of our kayak!! Plus it's basically the cutest thing ever! Awesome vest for the price, totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want your dog to drown upside down in a pool! :/
customer_reviews.text: This vest instantly flipped my 7lb chihuahua upside down in the water! Thankfully we were monitoring her very carefully, otherwise she could have easily drowned. I want to warn everyone here since small dogs, especially short snouted dogs like chihuahuas or pugs, can drown very quickly in comparison to others. I know the mermaid tail is cute but if you love your babies this is NOT worth the risk. Save your time and money, and go with an Outward Hound one. Yes it’s plain and simple, but it actually does what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Sizing ?!
customer_reviews.text: These seems pretty lightweight, but think adequate for the low price however completely confused about the sizing. My dog is a 50 pound goldendoodle. Going off people saying the sizing was small, I ordered the crocodile style in a large. My dog was SWIMMING in it. Way too big. So I ordered the medium in the blue bone and it is WAY too small. Not sure if the sizing is different for different colors or what, but there was a massive discrepancy between the two. I have ordered pet life jackets from other companies and had no sizing issues. I realize the fit will not be perfect, but the difference between these two seemed a bit extreme.....
customer_reviews.author: LC Clarke

customer_reviews.title: I use this to cut my pup's nails so he ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cut my pup's nails so he doesn't squirm and run away. I put it on him and then hang him by the loop from a banister. It works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Finally a life jacket for the big boys!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY found a life jacket that will fit my 125 lbs. Great Pyrenees! Hes not the best swimmer doesnt go past where he can touch. Bought it for the boat ! It fits him good.
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but is very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an XXL for my female shepherd who isn't done growing yet. (She loves swimming but she isn't very good haha) It fits well! Right now it's almost all the way tightened but she's not done growing and it's snug so I'm happy and she doesn't mind it at all! 😊 It's also very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Still fits great around him
customer_reviews.text: It is a little short on our Chihuahua mix we have. Still fits great around him. He is 11lbs and we got the XS. Go up a size if they are more than 8lbs I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These lifejackets are great!! The size fit perfect for our two small dogs. They are each 13lbs and the size small worked great. The lifejackets wraps around their belly underneath and secures with strong velcro. We took our Littles kayaking and when we went swimming they stayed floating. I LOVE the handle. It was so easy pick the dogs up with it and did not cause discomfort for them because the lifejackets is sturdy and wrapped around their body. I have now purchased an additional life vest for our ~78lb German Shepherd. Works great! Just follow the measurements!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 75 lb English Bulldog so he can enjoy the pool with the rest of the family. Bulldogs don't have much endurance so now he can jump right in and cool off without me worrying about him sinking. When I get it out, he gets super excited and can hardly hold still while I put it on him. Gives him plenty of buoyancy to let him swim. He doesn't swim for long periods of time but it would work well if he did.
customer_reviews.author: Stoutrose

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love the water - but the river runs fast.
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love the water but the river runs fast. This XXS life jacket fits our 5 lb dog and still allows her to run along the banks and sand. The bright pink is easy to see in the water. At $11 it gives good peace of mind that she won't be taken out to sea or down river.
customer_reviews.author: iPad user from day One

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a bust
customer_reviews.text: We ordered and received a Large to fit our dog whose girth measures 27 inches (the chart range for chest girth for a Large is 20 to 29 inches). The vest underbelly hook and loop fabric did not overlap enough to keep the vest in place. Clearly there's a problem between the sizing chart and actual production here. Front strap does not stay secured in the clasp. The body of the vest is not long enough to adequately support our dog's hind quarters (Goldendoodle at 50#). Ordered another vest from a different supplier whose Large size is significantly larger around, longer, and has much improved securement of the straps.
customer_reviews.author: KazooGuy

customer_reviews.title: My Pomeranian is chunky, but he damn sure isn't large!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I don't like ordering anything you wear from Amazon because they don't know how to use a tape measure. I ordered medium for our Pomeranian rat terrier mix. Granted, he is chunky because he takes prednisone for Addison disease. But this thing wouldn't fit a squirrel. You're better off going to a pet store with your dog and trying it on before you buy. Apparantly, even the dogs in China are smaller than American dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Ijustneedit

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.text: Literally purchased this vest in arrived on June 1st 2020 it's only June 14th. The jacket as you can see in the picture's provided this is not durable at all. I bought an XL our puppy is only 28weeks old and the vest hasn't held up at all. I don't recommend it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used four times in our pool for about 25-30 minutes each time. We don’t use a leash on it, our dog just swims along with us. Both side buckles fell off (one after the second use and the other after fourth use) and the stitching is completely out. There is no reason for this to happen because there is no stress on the seams just poor quality. It’s cute but not durable what so ever. Disappointed in purchase and of course by the time the weather was nice to use it the return window is closed. Definitely would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CarrieBeth

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great Danes!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s always nerve wracking buying for our Great Dane because she’s so big, but the XXL fit her great!!! The biggest point on her chest was 35 inches so we went with the XXL, if she grows more (which is likely, she just turned 1) she’ll fill it right out! It was easy to put on her but felt very, very secure. The whole Velcro wrap under her tummy felt more secure than just the buckles I saw on other life jackets (and more comfy too)! The handle on the back was great for when she got antsy on the boat & it had a leash clip. Couldn’t be happier with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dog who isn't the best swimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Following the size chart, I ordered appropriately for my dog's chest size and it fit great. It's actually just a tiny bit big but that's ok since the straps are adjustable and we cinched them down snugly enough. My American Bulldog is not the greatest swimmer but LOVES the water. The last time we went to the lake she nearly drowned trying to swim out to me and I swore she would not go again until I had a vest for her. WORTH EVERY CENT! It arrived fast and was so easy to put on quickly. She did not mind wearing it at all. Plus, she just looks adorable in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Thoracias

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog who likes to go kayaking with me. The fit is perfect if you go by the sizing chart and even then you have a little room to work with. I feel it runs big but that worked out for her. It keeps her floating when she is in the water, she basically swims like a rock but she thinks she is swimming. I don’t have the heart to tell her she is a horrible swimmer. She never complains that the life vest is uncomfortable so I am assuming she finds it comfortable to wear. All in all I am very happy with this dog life vest and I am pretty sure she is too.
customer_reviews.author: Tani McNally

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what to do between sizes?
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs about 8-10 lbs each (Morkies). Based on the measurements, we could go with either the XS or the S. I ordered one of each and the xs seems to be best. The small is a lot longer on the back, too long for our littler guy. While it offered more room, we decided tighter was better in the case of a life jacket. But, there is a big difference between the XS and the S. Unfortunately we are in between sizes. Good quality and very cute though. Came very quickly and I returned the unwanted S with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: geemomoney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, a little flimsy but not too bad!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a small for my chihuahua/yorkie mix. It fit perfectly and was pretty easy to put on him. He doesn’t usually like wearing clothes but this didn’t seem to bother him much. He is not a great swimmer (due to short legs) so we bought this to let him swim in a backyard pool. It seemed to work pretty well, only complaint is that it is a little flimsy. Not made of the strongest material, and I don’t think it would be able to save his life if something bad happened. Pretty good though as long as you keep a close eye on your dog.
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Issues corrected!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large and received a medium. Once aware of my issues, this company worked with me to correct the issues. The product itself is well made and really nice. I wish it would have fit my girl because it's super cute! Advice to anyone ordering: You will need a large at the smallest for any dog that is lab sized or bigger. The medium size was way too small for my smallish 20mo German shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity

customer_reviews.title: Great fest. Confident dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased one last year for my 60 pound golden retriever. He loved it. Gave him more confidence. Doesn’t want to get out of the water. Purchased another this year for 60 pound German Shepherd. Didn’t even think about a different brand. These are great. For the rough Velcro that is not covered, I cut piece of black felt to put over top so it wouldn’t catch on my suit. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Buckle is missing but fits great
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves her new life jacket! She doesn’t want to take it off. We haven’t gone swimming yet though. Also they left off half of the buckle for the neck part which is why I’m giving it 4/5 stars. She’s about 45 pounds and medium in stature and the large fits great. It’s a little big around the neck which makes me a little nervous since the buckle is messed up, but hopefully the Velcro will hold up in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkles

customer_reviews.title: Fits our gentle giant
customer_reviews.text: Was very scared this would not fit our 157# mastiff. I measured her and per the measurements she woukd fit an XXL. IT FITS! Still need to take her out on the boat with it but Im very happy with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep my dog afloat and fits well. If you think your dog is in between sizes I would get the bigger size because it can be adjusted with the straps to fit snugly around your dog. I bought an XXL for my dog who has a back length of 29 inches and neck measurement of 24 inches. Delivery was also quick and accurate according to Amazon's estimate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turned my doxie upside down in water!
customer_reviews.text: Although it was comfortable (she loved it until she got in water)on my 8lb weenie dog it turned her upside down in the water causing water to go up her nose. Luckily I was right with her. The vet said some dogs depending on where their weight is and how they move dont do well with the flat panel designed vests. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaylee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, light weight, nice material, fantastic pricing and speedy delivery. I love that I was able to find one to fit my 6 pound papillion. Typically stores dont carry her size or they are always out. Our fur baby is now ready for outdoor water adventures. I highly recommend this animal life vest you never know when your fur babies have had too much swim time as their body's arnt built like ours. I'll be ordering in more for our other dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sending Back
customer_reviews.text: I received this late yesterday and used it today for a few hours. When taking it off I noticed the wear & small hole on the part that goes around the neck (see picture). It was cute, fit well & easy to put on but that doesn't matter if it falls apart before our swimming season ends!
customer_reviews.author: Michele R

customer_reviews.title: sturdy vest
customer_reviews.text: I used the vest today on my 4 1/2 mo. old lab. It worked really well...and gave her enough buoyancy to swim around with no problem. My pup is nervous in the pool...so we are taking it slow...with treats. I recommend this vest. Pay attention to sizing.
customer_reviews.author: duckman

customer_reviews.title: Runs VERY small.
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews that said these come pretty small they are absolutely right I was initially going to get a medium for my 24 pound mini Australian Shepherd since she was within the measurements for that luckily I got a large and it is still way too small. on the large says 22 to 44 pounds she is 24 pounds and can barely fit in it. Its not long enough for her body and tight around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I’m not real sure about the capabilities of this vest
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give just three stars but I bought this for friends that recently got a tri pod dog so they could teach him their pool:) Honestly I can’t figure out how it could “save him” from drowning:( I’m not sure if the quality just wasn’t there because the cost was so much lower than the other bests I saw . I’m not sure I would trust this in a dire situation to save a dogs life.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E. Leever

customer_reviews.title: Worked as Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this little vest. I purchased this for our puppy who was going kayaking with us and hadn't been swimming yet. Super easy to put on and fit her perfectly. The bottom is velcro so be cautious with what you are wearing it kept snagging my swim suit. She took to the water like a pro and looked like a professional swimmer or so I thought. I took the vest off and she was a complete mess in the water. The vest works, it kept her (20lbs) up and floating. So thankful I found this and didn't have to spend an arm and a leg as she is now pushing 30lbs and no longer fits in the vest.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Duckworth

customer_reviews.title: 14lb Shark On The Loose
customer_reviews.text: 14lbs, size S Fits very well! Midsection is pretty far back and covers up my dogs winker, so he’ll definitely end up peeing on it at some point. Luckily we’ll be next to water, so we can rinse it. Otherwise, excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Corn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Not only is super cute but very buoyant too. Perfect fit. Large handle on back makes it easy to pull my Doxie mix out of the water and back onto my paddleboard
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great life jacket. Not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great life jacket that can be adjusted very easily. The only problem I had was with the thing you click the leash to. It ripped off on the first use. I just have to put her collar on, but other then that it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda W.

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Dog Vest EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my dog pink fish vest and the shark vest for the pool and it fit perfectly. It wasn't to big or thick on her neck. It was absolute perfect and she looks so cute. Its adjustable and could fit a thicker dog if needed to. The Velcro is also pretty strong too. My dog loves it. I give this a 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette carnero

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 after 1 year of heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: The solid adjustable midsection, the highlight of why you would buy this jacket. I feel like because of the amount of contact area in the middle it helps keep the dogs entire chest/abdomen supported and afloat. Used if heavily, and tend to be a bit tough on things, a little over a year. Used the handle a lot to help our girl get back on the kayak. Very cute turtle design and a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bubs

customer_reviews.title: Large fits 55-60lb pitbull
customer_reviews.text: Size L was perfect for my 55-60 lb pitbull, it is tightened just about all the way but a M would have been to small. I just cut the excess straps and burned the edges. She is comfortable in it and we can't wait to try it out in the water this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get a life jacket for my Yorkie After doing some research I decided on this one. For fit, I didn’t measure but looked at what others ordered that were similar to my dogs size. She is 8.2 pounds and I bought the extra small. It fit perfect. She didn’t seem to mind it being on her. I can’t wait til May, to try it out. I will update on the durability and if it works.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie walsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Served its purpose! Puppy jumped off the kayak and it was a stress free experience because I looked back and saw him floating alongside me, head above water! Convenient handle on top is icing on the cake! Easy to scoop him up out of the water! The fin lays down at first, but it seems like it may just be from initial packaging as it is starting to stay up now, after a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & love the handle
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this life jacket. Our pug wants to be with us all the time but can’t swim so what a relief when she’s near the water to know she’s safe. She even rides the Waverunner!
customer_reviews.author: Karate Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tested this out in water but let me just give this review as it stands right now. This vest is beautiful! I ordered a different vest (pink polka dot) in size Medium and the bottom didn’t even connect with velcro. I ordered this mermaid in Medium and it turned out amazing! Fits my pup and she doesn’t seem to be annoyed when test fitting and wearing indoors to get used to it. My dogs measurements below: Neck 16” Chest 24”
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Adorable safe little sharks!
customer_reviews.text: I got two in size medium for my Puggle (beagle and pig) and Bug (Boston terrier and pug) breeds. Easy to adjust to make them fit correctly. Dogs didn’t mind wearing them which is good. My puggle wont move an inch if I put a jacket or sweater on her so it was good she didn’t mind the life jacket. They haven’t gone in the water with them yet so I can’t verify how good they are as floating devices but they feel and look sturdy and safe. And they looked like adorable land sharks.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cute vest but not sure I’d consider it as a lifesaving device
customer_reviews.text: The vest is as cute as it can be. We have a miniature dachshund and the small was almost too big for her although she match the specs for a small. Fun for playing in the pool but not sure I would depend on it as a true lifesaving device. My other Dachshund rolled around in it and it did not help stabilize her at all.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 8/2019 It is now 5/2020 Used perhaps 2 dozen times. The Velcro’s it pulling the fabric apart. My dog loves the flotation comfort He’s very lean and has little body fat so his butt sinks lower than head. However, it just isn’t holding up to moderate use. It’s not too small so it’s not due to Pressure or overextending it.
customer_reviews.author: MG Mandell

customer_reviews.title: This vest saved my precious dogs life today!
customer_reviews.text: We had our English Bulldog out on our boat today and she loved it! I had her in the front of the boat with me and was hanging on to her by her leash. We were going really slow luckily when she accidentally slipped into the water. This life vest absolutely works! She took on a little water when she fell in but she was ok. My husband jumped in and got right to her thank goodness. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Tamie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dane Approved!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this for our American Great Dane and he seemed to like it well. The only thing I wished the product had was two handles instead of one. We will be using this when we go to the lake and it would be nice to have an additional handle to pull him back on the boat from swimming. Other than that a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this product. We took our 20lb jack Russell to the lake and it worked great! Comfortable enough for my dog and secure. I loved the handle on top as I was able to pull him out of the water onto the boat. Size was perfect. Definitely use the measurement chart which is not easily accessible before you buy. That is my only negative comment. Good material.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hensler

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functions
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to make sure our little guy didn’t drown while out on a boat and his first time in water over his head. It was a hot day and I think he overheated in it but gave us peace of mind. Acted as floaties when swimming for the first time. Took it off after he got too hot and he swam without it. Handle is handy for grabbing if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Evanko

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on him and we cant wait to try it ...
customer_reviews.text: The XL fits my 75lb hound dog perfectly. Looks good on him and we cant wait to try it out in a week. I am a little concerned because the material feels a little thin to me but I have not owned one of these before so I have nothing to compare it to. From the other reviews I have read, and from what I see in person, I think it will do its job. I will update after our vacation and we try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Med. fits 16 lb.  Westie perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The med. size fits my 16lb. Westie terrier perfectly. She is approx 18” body girth and 11” around neck. She measures 17” from base of neck to base of tail (body length). It hasn’t been used in water yet, but dog seems comfortable. The product does not appear to be very durable, so I’m not sure how it will hold up over time. For the price, it’s decent and should work for a couple of lake trips at least.
customer_reviews.author: Kalymata

customer_reviews.title: Length wise it fit her pretty well, however width wise was way too big
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of the reviews I went with a large for my 35lb collie puppy. Length wise it fit her pretty well, however width wise was way too big. I would not recommend this for long haired dogs due to the sticky side of the Velcro for the straps underneath faces up towards the dogs stomach, catching hair in it. If the Velcro was reversed this wouldn't be such an issue. The handle held up great when I hoisted her out of the water. I bought this for visibility only when she jumps out of the boat and swims in the lake. Everyone we saw loved the jacket and it did increase the viability of her.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: FITs perfect for a dane
customer_reviews.text: only gave it a 4 as we havnt tried it in water yet. but the sizing is perfect. she is 105lbs now and will likely be 130 and it fits well and with the velcro and adjustable straps looks like it will fit as she grows. looks as high quality as a human life jacket. she didnt mind wearing it either so must be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: angela belcher

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: our 10 month old dachshund (12-15lbs) fits perfect in a small with a little room to grow. it’s super cute and it helps him float, he’s already a strong swimmer but we have two big dogs that make waves so we want him to have some extra help. he didn’t like it at first but as soon as we got to water he forgot all about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Madden

customer_reviews.title: Now I don't have to worry about whether or not she can tread water and it fits great!
customer_reviews.text: We take our dog tubing with us, and the first time she nearly drowned me when she flipped out of her tube and I had to save her. Now I don't have to worry about whether or not she can tread water and it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to just pick her up with the handle and ...
customer_reviews.text: We took our 4-5 lb dog on boat fishing. It was easy to just pick her up with the handle and move her off boat. I felt much safer with this on her. Very cute too. The X-small was too small. I had to order bigger size and was unable to return the item because the cost to return was more that ordering another one. So I'm stuck with the smaller one. But, it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Partin

customer_reviews.title: 5 star doggy life jacket!
customer_reviews.text: The HAOCOO DOG LIFE JACKET in XS is perfect for my 6 pound chihuahua! Very cute, well made, adjustable, and thoughtfully designed with a grab handle and leash ring. I love this vest so much that I just bought the red one for my 11 pound Chihuahua in a small!
customer_reviews.author: YoMommaRhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too sure about size. I have trouble finding things to fit my little boy. He is a 4lb chihuahua. Bought this in XXS and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: blue33frog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the lake. Very cute and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is very anxious and gets upset if we try to put anything on him, including a leash. It was easy to put on and he tolerates it well. Works great. The handle comes in very handy when getting him onto the boat after a swim.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to find a puppy lifejacket for our little pup. She was only two pounds in this photo. I don't think she loves it.... she had a hard time walking in it at first but she got the hang of it. I lines up little treats to get her to walk and that seemed to do the trick. It works too! We took her in the water and she floats.
customer_reviews.author: Net Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t confirm comfort, but my 12-lb Yorkie wears in the pool all the time. Easy to put on and take off. Keep out of sun when not in use. This is my second one. first one eventually faded from leaving in sun to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Puppy on the Water
customer_reviews.text: A great, affordable puppy life jacket for when the doggie is near the water. Plus, the snuggly nature of the life jacket helps to keep her feeling safe and decreases anxiety, especially when trying a new activity like kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Mom/Teacher

customer_reviews.title: My best dog purchase this year
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this life jacket! I have a large Italian Mastiff and wanted a lifejacket that was as sturdy and durable as she is. This buy did not disappoint! It fits her perfectly, supports her perfectly in the water, and looks fantastic! Has served us well for many pool/river/lake days. Now I have a Mastiff Mermaid!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby price

customer_reviews.title: Clip on top fails. DO NOT USE!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was tethered to my boat. She fell overboard. The stitching failed. She floated but had we not been at the dock, it would have been a seriously bad dog-overboard situation. Look elsewhere for a better product. I am.
customer_reviews.author: Mintyfresh1968

customer_reviews.title: which seemed like it was made for a 70 pound dog
customer_reviews.text: So my 26 pound Cockapoo didn't even come close to fitting a Small or a Medium. Based on her weight, I ordered a medium first, which seemed like it was made for a 70 pound dog. Returned it. Ordered a Small; which seemed to be made for a 8 pound Chihuahua. Went with a different style and vendor where a medium was a perfect fit. Definite quality control issues....
customer_reviews.author: SpecialK

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have a chocolate lab and really we dont need this cause he is an excellent swimmer but he goes over does it and is in deep water...this makes me feel better. He swims well with it on and doesnt mind it.
customer_reviews.author: mart Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Trying to contact seller
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I’d like to contact the seller to see if they’ll replace our dog’s life jacket? Can’t figure out how to aside from here - I know we missed the return window, but we didn’t get the chance to use it on the river until after. The side tore out the first time we used it. The pup was pulled from the water once with some help from the handle, but it definitely shouldn’t have torn. Hoping to have a replacement sent? It seemed like a nice jacket aside from that, I’d love to give another chance and fix the low rated review. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits to size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 7lbs Pom, {size xs}. I was excited when we received it because it fit her perfectly, just as well as her harness. She seemed pretty comfortable in it during her river adventure but when in the water I’m not sure if it was actually working as a life jacket should. She seemed more awkward in the water with it and looked as if it were weighting her down instead of healing her. I will try it out again in a pool setting and see if it actually does what I need it to do. In the plus side it’s reasonably priced and super stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Marvinlee

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: We got this vest for our 12 lb. poodle mix. He actually likes to wear it! It seems comfortable for him, and we like the handle that allows us to pick him up when needed. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: MBee

customer_reviews.title: A Well Designed and Needed Life Vest
customer_reviews.text: It fits my dog good. He has a big chest and this has a nice Velcro wrap that fastens under his chest and stomach. He’s 52 lbs but I can lift him by the back strap. My dog is usually very uncomfortable in any kind of clothing but he’s fine with this vest. Good job!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Great life preserver and super-easy company to deal with!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! The first one I bought was a little big (my fault, I got confused when ordering). Company took it back with no fuss at all. Ordered the next size down and it I'd perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Black

customer_reviews.title: Great Life Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Looks sturdy enough, and my dog Selma is already getting used to walking in it. Only problem so far is bad on my end, the size is a tad to small for a large. Again, mistake on our end, since we assumed that a medium sized dog would fit perfectly with a large life jacket, oops. At least it's snug and just tight enough, only problem is wrapping the Velcro around her, she's a sturdy girl who weighs 58-60 in. Hopefully she'll only need it for one summer since we're not sure she has ever swam before since we adopted her.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Fits small!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was very nice. However I had bought several life vests at the same time to see different sizes and styles. This style/pattern was so dang cute but it was a medium and fit like a small. My GSP is 33lbs but has a big chest and it didn’t fit her very well at all. Returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Alexandra H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this would be to big for my 3lb puppy, but it fit perfectly! Even if she grows more, this should fit her even as an adult. Haven’t used it in the water yet, but we are going on vacation next week and will be testing it. May update ratings after that. As for the puppy liking it... lol. It’s gonna take time, but at least she’ll be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style & Ease
customer_reviews.text: Adjusts well! We followed the measurement guide provided. For our large Walker dog well and was easy to manage him in the water. The design didn’t seem to bother him at all.
customer_reviews.author: SC Perks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie L😍VES to swim!! She will toss balls in the pool and bark so she can go swim. She was aggressively trying to get her ball and fell in, but having her life vest on she didn’t go under water, wasn’t frantic and just swam around loving life!!
customer_reviews.author: Lilkipp

customer_reviews.title: Huskyyy
customer_reviews.text: My dog looks super cute in it, got it for my puppy so she’s a little small as of yet but it worked! She loves swimming with me but freaks out if I’m not holding her or this isn’t on.
customer_reviews.author: Undergrad

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my baby boy so he can go in the swimming pool I got him. He is an American Bully and needed this so he won't sink. The fit was good just a little bit long on him.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and measured according to the size chart, then ordered a medium. The medium was too small so I exchanged it for a large. The large fits pretty well. I first ordered the pink polka dots but then the large was out of stock so I got the blue flowers. My dog is an Australian Shepherd and about 40 pounds. Her measurements fell under the size medium on the size chart, but it wouldn’t even Velcro around her chest. The exchange was simple and worth it. Love the blue flowers even more!!
customer_reviews.author: Bz

customer_reviews.title: CAN DROWN DOG
customer_reviews.text: I got one after measuring twice and it fit around his belly but was too big by just a fraction of an inch around his chest. He fell off the paddle board and his arms got stuck in the chest strap, he couldn’t paddle and flipped upside down in the life jacket. He could’ve died. Literally. If I wasn’t there to grab him immediately. These run larger than the chart says,which is a HUGE safety issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Huge Success!
customer_reviews.text: Upon first opening the package, I was worried that there wasn't enough cushion to help my 40 pound pit bull float, but we strapped it on and tried it anyways and she's officially a water dog now! She wears it every time she goes swimming and has made her confidence in the water sky rocket! She knows exactly what it means when I grab it, and has to sit and lick it when I take it off, she loves it! Not to mention how adorable she looks as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shark Life Jacket
customer_reviews.text: My grand dog Sadie loves to swim. Why have a boring orange life jacket when one can be a Shark? This vest fit her nicely and seems to be comfortable on her. It is very light weight but seems to provide the right amount of flotation.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed as it doesn't keep our multi poo of seven months afloat that much; can barely keep her head up. Very cute though!
customer_reviews.author: Terry A. Helm

customer_reviews.title: Size up for sure
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews that commented about the item running small. I agree. I originally purchased a medium for a lab puppy. She outgrew it by 4 months of age. When I ordered another I got XL and it’s a little big but it works and she’ll grow into it. That being said, it does the job and she stays in the water with us without drowning us!!
customer_reviews.author: mvatty

customer_reviews.title: Deciding between Medium or Large?
customer_reviews.text: My boy's chest is 22 inches so I ordered a Medium which, according to the size chart, should fit up to 24.8 inches. The Velcro under his chest is just able to close and the straps are fully extended on him, to the ends. It just fits him with no room to spare. So, if your dog's chest measures any fraction above 22 inches, get the Large! Otherwise, it's a nice little vest and much more lightweight than I was expecting. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. It fits my large dog well with room to spare. It has the added effect of "thundershirt" like calming. He won't even walk around off leash he's so chill.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan C. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Functional and adorable
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart was very accurate. It fit my dogs well and kept them a float. They're not strong swimmers but we can enjoy the water with them safely now.
customer_reviews.author: alicia h

customer_reviews.title: XL isn't THAT big; wouldn't fit our 100 lb. Lab. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Materials and quality were good but an XL didn't even come close to fitting our 100 lb. Lab; no way to close it around his broad chest (he's not fat). I should have checked the fit as soon as it arrived but I waited until I needed it and by then it was too late to return it so I ended up giving it to some friends with a smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Safety feature broke first time using it.
customer_reviews.text: Secuiry features, the clip under the front chest piece broke the very first time we used it. The plastic clip is broken which lessens the Securtiy of the life jacket. Obviously the stretch feature goes out the window with this piece breaking, no stretch was allowed. It is now too late to return it. After we ordered, we did not use it for the first time, until a month later, so first time wearing it, it broke. What can you do?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BIG DOG LIFE VEST
customer_reviews.text: I used this life jacket for my 90 lb pitty and it worked great. I got an XLG. The quality was great. The Velcro and clips never came undone. The handle on the back to pull them out of the water is very sturdy. It is very slim fitting but kept them afloat in the water. I bought a second one for my 93 lb pitty.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Cute & safe
customer_reviews.text: My pup always heads straight for the shore - not too into swimming. It gives us peace of mind to know she’s got this on at the lake, just in case. She only weighs 5 lbs and has no problem staying up right. Head is a bit low in the water. It’s super cute!
customer_reviews.author: yak

customer_reviews.title: Pet life jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design. Bright color. Comfortable to wear. Fit his measurements well. He is weirdly shaped but fit him exactly to what I ordered. Works great! So great that once he figured he could float he stopped kicking and just literally floated all over the pool. Arrived fast and good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Feel better having it.
customer_reviews.text: My girl can swim decent without it but she gets crazy chasing balls in the pool and does better with it on. She’s a tall skinny pup weighs about 52lbs and her chest is 27”. I got her the large which just fits her maybe should have went with a XL.
customer_reviews.author: loraine

customer_reviews.title: * mine is 3 pounds" this life Jacket will not do them any good. its to top heavy and they flip over ...
customer_reviews.text: if you have a small dog.. * mine is 3 pounds" this life Jacket will not do them any good. its to top heavy and they flip over as for when it fits properly the dog should flip over and stay floating like they were swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Very good and stable dog life jacket!
customer_reviews.text: A medium fit my 16 pound Havanese just great and his first time in the water was not a disaster like I thought it would be. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Boston K

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on our Corgi puppy he’s about 9-10 pounds and I got the size small. He can swim with ease! I like the handle on the top to help him to get in and out of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog life vest
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our 90 lb. yellow lab. It fits him well and he doesn't mind wearing it. He can swim on his own really well being a lab but when he's out with us in deep water he can relax a little bit and let the vest do some of the work.
customer_reviews.author: Dorie

product_meta.title: HAOCOO Dog Life Jacket Vest Saver Safety Swimsuit Preserver with Reflective Stripes/Adjustable Belt for Dog
product_meta.description:
Size:XX-Small| Color:Blue Polka DotAre you still worry about the safety issue about your beloved dog for all water sport activities?Just came here, HAOCOO provides you 7 sizes life vest for all sized dogs,
with high visibility colors, reflective strips, easy-grab handles, quick release buckles and outstanding flotation, no more worries about your dogs for every water sports.

Size Chart:
XXS:Body Length: 5.9 inches Neck Girth: 7.48-10.62inches Body Girth: 11.02-14.56 inches Weight:0 - 5.51lb 
XS: Body Length: 8.26 inches Neck Girth: 9.84-13.77inches Body Girth: 11.81-16.53 inches Weight:5.51 - 8.81lb
S:Body Length: 10.23 inches Neck Girth: 14.17-18.5inches Body Girth: 16.14-20.86 inches Weight:8.81 - 15.43lb
M:Body Length: 11.8 inches Neck Girth: 15.74-18.89inches Body Girth: 16.14-24.8 inches Weight:15.43 - 22.04lb
L:Body Length: 13.77 inches Neck Girth: 16.53-21.25inches Body Girth: 19.68-29.52 inches Weight:22.04 - 44.09lb
XL:Body Length: 17.71 inches Neck Girth: 19.68-27.95inches Body Girth: 27.55-37.4 inches Weight:44.09 - 77.16lb
XXL:Body Length: 18.89 inches Neck Girth: 24.4-35.43inches Body Girth: 34.64-48.81 inches Weight:Over 77.16lb

Package List: 1 x HAOCOO Dog Life Vest
This product is sold exclusively by HAOCOO. Only buy from HAOCOO to get genuine HAOCOO(TM) products with manufacturer warranty and superb customer service.
feature_bullets: MATERIALS: High grade Polyester Oxford & Nylon Fabric, Mesh Fabric, Pearl Cotton Foam. The oxford nylon fabric is ripstop, and the mesh fiber allow for quick drying and proper drainage.
DIMENSION: Available for 7 sizes, from XXS to XXL, meet all sized dogs. Please refer to the dimension chart to choose the right size for your dog.

CONVENIENCE: Adjustable belt and quick-release buckles to make your dog fit comfortably, easy to put on and take off. Handle on top for quick and easy grabbing. The Heavy-duty D-ring Hook is perfect for dog leash.
SAFETY: The front float assists in keeping dog's head above water. Reflective stripes and bright colors to enhance maximum visibility.

NOTE: If your measurement is between two sizes, we recommend the larger size for more comfortable fit about your dog. Please allow sight deviation of measurement data due to different measure methods.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
